import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom" import "./style.css"; function Header () { window.addEventListener('scroll', function() { let lastScrollY = window.pageYOffset; if (lastScrollY > 50) { document.querySelector('.header').classList.add('header-active') } else { document.querySelector('.header').classList.remove('header-active') } document.querySelector('.header-link').onclick = function (){ document.querySelector.click() } }) return (
